text: The statue of Albrecht von Roon () is an outdoor 1904 monument to Albrecht von Roon by Harro Magnusson, installed in Tiergarten in Berlin, Germany. ==External links== * Category:1904 establishments in Germany Category:1904 sculptures Category:Monuments and memorials in Berlin Category:Outdoor sculptures in Berlin Category:Statues in Germany Category:Sculptures of men in Germany Category:Tiergarten (park)
title: Statue of Albrecht von Roon
